data.title: NBA Player of the Month awards by player
data.meta_description: NBA players selected as Player of the Month since the award was created.
data.text:
List of players awarded with the NBA Player of the Month award in league history.

The NBA Player of the Month award was created in the 1979-80' season and Moses Malone was its first recipient. The award is reserved to the best performers of the best teams of the month. Initially, there was only one player awarded in the entire league, but since 2001-02' season, at least two players are selected, one from the Eastern Conference and another from the Western Conference. In several ocasions, the award has been shared by two or more players.

NBA players with most Player of the Month awards
